plot: Based on the poem by William Henry Drummond (1854-1907), this animated short tells the story of the ship "Julie Plante" which foundered and sank on a stormy night.
title: The Wreck of the Julie Plante
plot_es: Based on the poem by William Henry Drummond (1854-1907), this animated short tells the story of the ship "Julie Plante" which foundered and sank on a stormy night.
original_name: The Wreck of the Julie Plante
plot_en: Based on the poem by William Henry Drummond (1854-1907), this animated short tells the story of the ship "Julie Plante" which foundered and sank on a stormy night.
